name: haruhi
description:
a super short narrative/puzzle/roguelike with floaty movement

you're a scientist who's stuck in a time loop.
you reset every time you touch something - but the world doesn't.
find clues, unlock areas, and get yourself unstuck from the loop.

controls: wasd/arrows + click

made in 3 days for no particular reason
no relationship with the Haruhi Suzumiya franchise
made with unity + ink
